description:
A team that runs a group chat with participants taking turns in a round-robin fashion
    to publish a message to all.
label: RoundRobinGroupChat

participants.description:
An agent that provides assistance with tool use.
    The :meth:`on_messages` returns a :class:`~autogen_agentchat.base.Response`
    in which :attr:`~autogen_agentchat.base.Response.chat_message` is the final
    response message.
participants.label: AssistantAgent

config.name: assistant

model_client.description: Chat completion client for OpenAI hosted models.
model_client.label: OpenAIChatCompletionClient

workbench.description:
A workbench that provides a static set of tools that do not change after
    each tool execution, and supports streaming results.
workbench.label: StaticStreamWorkbench

model_context.description: An unbounded chat completion context that keeps a view of the all the messages.
model_context.label: UnboundedChatCompletionContext

config.description: An agent that provides assistance with ability to use tools.
config.system_message: You are a helpful assistant who can solve to solve tasks.

participants.description: An agent that can represent a human user through an input function.
participants.label: UserProxyAgent

conditions.description: Terminate the conversation if a specific text is mentioned.
conditions.label: TextMentionTermination

conditions.description: Terminate the conversation after a maximum number of messages have been exchanged.
conditions.label: MaxMessageTermination
